org.dkpro.core.decompounding.splitter

Class DataDrivenSplitterAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dkpro.core.decompounding.splitter.DataDrivenSplitterAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SplitterAlgorithm

    public class DataDrivenSplitterAlgorithm
extends Object
implements SplitterAlgorithm
    A data driven algorithm, that uses a TRIE to look for splits
